mapper.select: /*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectNoticeSingle */ SELECT seq , lang , notice_gbn , title , content , writer , write_date , view_cnt , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM notice WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectSipaNewsSingle */ SELECT seq , lang , notice_gbn , title , content , writer , write_date , view_cnt , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM sipa_news WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectEventSingle */ SELECT seq , lang , title , writer , write_date , location , year , start_date , end_date , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM event WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectFaqSingle */ SELECT seq , lang , title , content , writer , write_date , view_cnt , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM faq WHERE seq = #{seq}

/* com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectPopupSingle */ SELECT seq , use_yn , title , published_date , expiration_date , width_pixel , left_pixel , top_pixel , align , writer , content , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM popup WHERE seq = #{value}

/* com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectBannerList */ SELECT seq , title , view_seq , writer , write_date , file_id_list , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM banner WHERE 1=1
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
ORDER BY view_seq , write_date DESC

/* com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectBannerSingle */ SELECT seq , title , view_seq , writer , write_date , file_id_list , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM banner WHERE seq = #{seq}

/* com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectBizanmList */ SELECT seq , support_field , support_biz_name , apply_start_date , apply_end_date , business_organization , ministry_competent , business_overview , apply_way , contact_tel , content , file_id_list , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM bizanm WHERE 1=1
AND support_biz_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND business_organization LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND ( support_biz_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') )
ORDER BY init_regi_dttm desc, apply_start_date asc

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectBizanmSingle */ SELECT seq , support_field , support_biz_name , apply_start_date , apply_end_date , business_organization , ministry_competent , business_overview , apply_way , apply_detail_link , contact_tel , content , file_id_list , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM bizanm WHERE seq = #{seq}

/* com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectBidanmList */ SELECT seq , support_biz_name , apply_start_date , apply_end_date , business_organization , ministry_competent , business_overview , apply_way , apply_detail_link , contact_tel , content , file_id_list , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM bidanm WHERE 1=1
AND support_biz_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND business_organization LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND ( support_biz_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') )
ORDER BY init_regi_dttm desc, apply_start_date asc

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectBidanmSingle */ SELECT seq , support_biz_name , apply_start_date , apply_end_date , business_organization , ministry_competent , business_overview , apply_way , apply_detail_link , contact_tel , content , file_id_list , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM bidanm WHERE seq = #{seq}

/* com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectIssueList */ SELECT seq , support_field , support_biz_name , ministry_competent , content , file_id_list , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM issue WHERE 1=1
AND support_biz_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND ( support_biz_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') )
ORDER BY init_regi_dttm desc

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectIssueSingle */ SELECT seq , support_field , support_biz_name , ministry_competent , content , file_id_list , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM issue WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectAscdirectorsSingle */ SELECT seq , lang , company_name , company_ceo , company_homepage , company_tel , company_address , company_business_type , company_business_item , logo , intro , field , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM ascdirectors WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectAdviserSingle */ SELECT seq , gbn , lang , position , name , organization , depart , homepage , tel , brief_description , represent_image , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM adviser WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectConsultationSingle */ SELECT seq , gbn , lang , position , name , organization , depart , homepage , tel , brief_description , represent_image , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM adviser WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectCompanySingle */ SELECT seq , gbn , lang , company_name , company_ceo , company_homepage , company_tel , company_address , company_business_type , company_business_item , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM company WHERE seq = #{seq}

/*com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectPartnershipSingle */ SELECT seq , lang , company_name , company_ceo , company_homepage , company_tel , company_address , company_business_type , company_business_item , logo , intro , field , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM partnership WHERE seq = #{seq}

/* com.mtf.sipa.mapper.SipaMngMapper.selectFileUserIdList */ SELECT id , user_id , full_file_path , full_path , folder_path , full_file_name , uuid , file_name , note , init_regi_pic , init_regi_dttm , final_regi_pic , final_regi_dttm FROM file WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND file_yn = 'Y'
